feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:58 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 9:11 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: E 34 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
